dynRDFa

Class ModelMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • dynRDFa.ModelMaker

  • public class ModelMaker
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of the ModelMaker class is to provide methods that transform a relational (mySQL) database to structures that can be utilized to generate RDFa enriched web pages. At first a D2RQModel is created using a mapping file and a mySQL database. It contains all the statements that can be produced from the database, expressed in the default D2RQ vocabulary. Subsequently, a Jena Model is created using a CONSTRUCT query where the desired attributes and vocabulary are dictated. SELECT queries retrieve only the necessary statements. The query results are used to populate structures (exportableModel) that can be consumed by the classes responsible for generating the web pages.
    Author:
    magda

    • Method Detail

      • initializeD2RQModel

        public void initializeD2RQModel()
        Creates a Jena model view on the data in the D2RQ-mapped mysql database. A previously created mapping file is utilized. This mapping file, called the default mapping, maps each table to a new RDFS class that is based on the table's name, and maps each column to a property based on the column's name. The model that occurs will be queried later.

      • constructModel

        public void constructModel()
        Loads and executes a CONSTRUCT SPARQL query, which results in the Jena Model that contains all the statements from the D2RQModel, expressed in the desired vocabulary.

      • selectOnModel

        public void selectOnModel(int choice)
        Initializes inner structures, loads the select query that corresponds to the choice parameter and executes it, calls class method createTreeples(ResultSet resultSet) in order to generate all the treeples that correspond to the results of the select query.
        Parameters:
        choice - is the type of file to be created by velocity.

      • createTreeples

        public void createTreeples(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.ResultSet resultSet)
        Parameters:
        resultSet - is the product of the select query.

      • printObjectLookup

        public void printObjectLookup()
        Prints the objectLookup private field. It contains the objects of statements that are subjects in other statements.

      • getMappings

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMappings()
        Getter.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList that contains the prefix mappings in a String form, ready to be inserted in a velocity template.

      • publicationsPerYear

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> publicationsPerYear()
        Creates a TreeMap that has as a key a year, and as a value the number of publications.
        Returns:
        TreeMap with publications per year.
